Text:
I saw this in Seattle either 2009 or early 2010, and yes it is definitely good. I wouldn't say it was awesome, but, i'm a sucky reviewer sometimes so don't listen to me. I still placed it in the "moderately good to very good" category at the time of viewing.

Interestingly, many people left during the play. Like, more than would be expected. I think they may have been offended by all the swearing.

As someone with mental illness I thought this was a very good adaptation - somewhat similar to Book of Mormon -- it both mocks and enlightens and respects regarding the mental health community at large.

Anyway, thanks for posting!
